this is like a subset or a programmatic technique where your ad inventory is bid
on by multiple different ad exchanges at the same side this can be client-side which means all
of those auctions have been in the users browser like as a site
loads several requests are sent out various auctions happen information
comes back or it can be server to server where all your connections are in the
cloud with whatever platform you're using you send one request out and then all the options happen on that server
everything comes back there's pros and cons to either one of these and it kind
